desc.name: SCI-BI is my direct employer. I got outsourced to Redington and I work for them.
Developed a Web App that takes multiple AWS Invoice PDFs as input, extracts its data and stores output data in a single CSV file
Developed multiple Pyspark scripts to get Data from different sources. and performed transformations which met client's needs
Currently working on custom data visualization Tool
Tools and Technologies : Python | Flask | React | Spark | JavaScript
Worked on E-commerce site for India's leading automobile industry. Built with enhanced optimization.
Worked on Data Analysis | Data Visualization based on business & client requirements.
Tools and Technologies : HTML | CSS | JS | Wordpress | PowerBI | Chartio
Got Hands-on training in Hadoop | Spark with AWS and Worked on a Data-Migration project.
Worked on Data Management Project from gathering Data, Preparation, Analysis , ETL and Visualization
Tools and Technologies : SQL-Server | Python | Spark | AWS | PowerBI
Joined for Sales & Marketing Position. Later due to requirements, I learnt SQL and worked as a SQL-Developer.
Maintain customers and clients database, writing SQL scripts, performing scd's in sql-server.
I also co-ordinated with other team to sell and service RO water purifiers and Electronic products
